statusLine.command: input=$(cat); cwd="$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir')"; model="$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name')"; branch="$(cd "$cwd" 2>/dev/null && git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD 2>/dev/null || echo 'no-git')"; status="$(cd "$cwd" 2>/dev/null && git status --porcelain 2>/dev/null | wc -l | xargs)"; printf "[%s] %s %s" "$(basename "$cwd")" "$branch" "$model"; if [ "$status" -gt 0 ]; then printf " (%s)" "$status"; fi
